documentation.description: Creates a special PIN entry field with multiple input boxes

attributes.size: The number of digits in the PIN.
attributes.name: The name of the field

events.change: Fired each time the input value is changed

getters.value: Returns the value of the PIN
getters.size: Returns the number of digits in the entry field
getters.name: Returns the input name

setters.value: Sets the value of the PIN
setters.size: Sets the number of digits to be entered
setters.name: Sets the input name and the controls name
